"cloudkid.ParticleUtils"

Static Methods

combineRGBComponents(r : Int, g : Int, b : Int) : Int

parameters
{Int} r The red value of the color
{Int} g The green value of the color
{Int} b The blue value of the color
returns
{Int} The color in the form of 0xRRGGBB
Combines separate color components (0-255) into a single uint color.

generateEase(segments : Array<Dynamic>) : Float -> Float

parameters
{Array<Dynamic>} segments An array of segments, as created by http://www.greensock.com/customease/.
returns
{Float->Float} A function that calculates the percentage of change at a given point in time (0-1 inclusive).
Generates a custom ease function, based on the GreenSock custom ease, as demonstrated by the related tool at http://www.greensock.com/customease/.

getBlendMode(name : String) : Int

parameters
{String} name The name of the blend mode to get.
returns
{Int} The blend mode as specified in the PIXI.blendModes enumeration.
Gets a blend mode, ensuring that it is valid.

hexToRGB(color : String, output : Array<Int>) : Array<Int>

parameters
{String} color The input color string.
{Array<Int>} output An array to put the output in. If omitted, a new array is created.
returns
{Array} The array of numeric color values.
Converts a hex string from "#AARRGGBB", "#RRGGBB", "0xAARRGGBB", "0xRRGGBB", "AARRGGBB", or "RRGGBB" to an array of ints of 0-255 or Numbers from 0-1, as r, g, b, (a).

length(point : pixi.geom.Point) : Float

parameters
{pixi.geom.Point} point The point to measure length
returns
{Float} The length of this point.
Returns the length (or magnitude) of this point.

normalize(point : pixi.geom.Point) : Void

parameters
{pixi.geom.Point} point The point to normalize
Reduces the point to a length of 1.

rotatePoint(angle : Float, p : pixi.geom.Point) : Void

parameters
{Float} angle The angle to rotate by in degrees
{pixi.geom.Point} p The point to rotate around 0,0.
Rotates a point by a given angle.

scaleBy(point : pixi.geom.Point, value : Float) : Void

parameters
{pixi.geom.Point} point The point to scaleBy
value {Float} The value to scale by.
Multiplies the x and y values of this point by a value.
